tasks.label: Monitor Database (Live)
tasks.command: adb logcat -c; adb logcat | Select-String 'Saved recognition:'

tasks.label: Database Stats
tasks.command: $logs = adb logcat -d | Select-String 'Saved recognition:'; Write-Host '=== DATABASE STATUS ===' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host "Total: $($logs.Count) recognitions" -ForegroundColor Green; adb shell 'run-as com.visionfocus ls -lh databases/' | Select-String visionfocus; Write-Host '\nRecent:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; $logs | Select-Object -Last 5
